bt:String.DefaultValue: Click a button to start using The Consultant Toolbox.
Clear content from selected text boxes.
Clear all text content from the current slide.
Reshapes the selected items to the same size as the first selected.
Reshapes the selected items to the same height as the first selected.
Reshapes the selected items to the same width as the first selected.
Swaps positions of two selected items.
Copies the position of a selected item, in order to paste it later.
Puts the object selected in the position copied previously.
Copies the dimensions of a selected item, in order to paste it later.
Puts the object into the dimensions copied previously.
Resizes the shape so that its boundaries match the text content.
Shrinks (or otherwise adjusts) the text so that it fits within the current shape size.
Wraps and unwraps text from selected items.
Creates a Post-It within the slide.
Creates a footnote within the slide.
